Question: Shenzhen Hugh Ang Electronic Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Hugh Ang Electronic Co., Ltd

Product 1: Smart Watch

 - Manufactured with a 2000 square meters workshop
 - Supported by 6 production lines
 - BSCI Audit and ISO9001 certified

Product 2: Smart Bracelet

 - Emphasis on R&D and supply chain management
 - Daily production capacity of over 8,000 pieces
 - Offers OEM/ODM services

Certifications

 - ISO 9001:2014
 - BSCI
 - CE
 - ROHS
 - FCC

(Note: The company has been operating since 2012 and specializes in smart watches and fitness trackers.)
Summary_cn:
深圳豪安电子有限公司

产品1：智能手表

- 设有2000平方米的车间
- 支持6个生产线
- BSCI审核和ISO9001认证

产品2：智能手环

- 侧重于研发和供应链管理
- 每天的生产能力超过8000件
- 提供OEM/ODM服务

认证

- ISO 9001:2014
- BSCI
- CE
- ROHS
- FCC

（注：该公司成立于2012年，专门从事智能手表和健身追踪器的生产。）
